ref.mixed-citation: Chen M. “‘Aboshen’ yu ‘ba’ersamo’”;175, with reference to Zhou Jiashou’s 周嘉胄 (1582–1658) Xiangcheng 香乘, juan 4. Much of Zhou Jiashou’s information goes back to Ye Tinggui’s 葉廷珪 ( jinshi 1115) Nanfan xianglu 南蕃香錄 (Record of Aromatic Substances of Foreign Countries in the South) from 1151.
